abstract: Free agent outfielder Delmon Young is arrested for battery after attacking Miami hotel parking attendant; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Delmon Young, a free agent most recently with the Baltimore Orioles, was arrested and charged with battery after choking and threatening a parking attendant at a Miami hotel.

headline.main: Delmon Young Is Charged in Attack

snippet: Delmon Young, a free agent most recently with the Baltimore Orioles, was arrested and charged with battery after choking and threatening a parking attendant at a Miami hotel.
